title.rendered: How to Attend Virtual Recruiting Events

content.rendered:
Handshake is the place to find virtual recruiting events for students at your school. There are different ways to discover these events and learn about the employers who are hosting sessions. Our team is sharing tips for finding the events you want to attend and making the most of your event experience, including:

  1. Check your email inbox
  2. Register early
  3. Fill up your session schedule

Watch the full video below to learn how to attend virtual recruiting events.

excerpt.rendered: Our team shares tips for finding and registering for events with top employers.
